## KumoStore.state property

The current store state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get state(): KumoStoreState<T>;
```

## Remarks

Should not be accessed before the store is loaded. Assign a function to [onLoaded](./lib-base.kumostore.onloaded.md) to get a callback when this happens.

See [KumoStoreState](./lib-base.kumostorestate.md) for the list of properties returned.
